title: Readout of the President's Call with Colombian President-Elect Santos | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 24, 2010

 



Readout of the President's Call with Colombian President-Elect Santos




Earlier today President Obama called Colombian President-elect Juan Manuel Santos to congratulate him on his historic victory in Sunday’s run-off election.  The President and President-elect Santos discussed their shared desire to deepen the strong relationship between the United States and Colombia across a wide range of bilateral, hemispheric, and global issues and to work together to improve the lives of people in both countries.
